the_portal.title: New Feature: The Portal
the_portal.description: The Portal is now the main access point for new activity content and is available directly from orbit.

customization.title: Activity Customization
customization.description: Allows players to choose modifiers and improve rewards.

categories.name: Challenges
categories.description: Unique sandbox-based challenges. Up to five per activity can be selected.

categories.name: Banes
categories.description: Random enemies have a unique effect that makes them more powerful. There are seven new bane types.

categories.name: Boons
categories.description: Beneficial player boosts. For example, Elemental Surges.

categories.name: Player Stakes
categories.description: Non-sandbox-based modifiers. For example, No HUD or No Starting Ammo.

categories.name: Rules Modifiers
categories.description: A new set of static modifiers including information about scoring, enemy composition, toughness, and bane frequency.

components.name: Challenge Multiplier
components.description: Fireteam based, shared by everyone. Increased by difficulty tier, Challenges, Banes, and Player Stakes.

components.name: Reward Multiplier
components.description: Player based. Increased by Power level, wearing new or featured gear, and by obtaining scoring bonuses.

components.name: Reward Score
components.description: Determined by Challenge and Reward Multipliers, translates into rewards based on Reward Rank and Reward Package.

components.name: Reward Rank
components.description: Player progression from Copper, capping at Diamond V. Determines score needed for a specific Reward Package.

components.name: Reward Package
components.description: The reward earned based on grade (C up to A+), containing gear, power, and currencies.

bonus_timer.title: Bonus Timer
bonus_timer.description: Activities now have a bonus countdown timer, rewarding up to a 15% bonus to your score depending on time left.

seasonal_hub.title: New Feature: Seasonal Hub
seasonal_hub.description: New home to challenges and rewards to help your Guardian power up during the Season.

challenges_hub.title: Challenges Hub
challenges_hub.description: Features Daily and Weekly challenges targeting Portal activities, granting ranks on a new Weekly Reward Track, Bright Dust, and XP.

weekly_reward_track.title: Weekly Reward Track
weekly_reward_track.description: Resets weekly and is account-scoped. Rewards include Currencies (Exotic Ciphers, Unstable Cores, Strange Coins, Bright Dust), Powerful Gear Engrams, Armory Requisitions, and Arsenal Credits.

conquests.title: Conquests
conquests.description: Six conquest activities with one-time powerful rewards.

armory_and_arsenal_rewards.title: Armory and Arsenal Rewards (Commander Zavala)
armory_and_arsenal_rewards.description: Offers a weekly selection of New Gear armor (Armory) and weapons (Arsenal) claimable with new currencies. Unearned credits/expansions can be purchased for Bright Dust.

changes.description: Armor stats no longer require tiers of 10. Their effects scale with each individual point from 1-200.
The six legacy stats have been replaced with new stats, each providing a base benefit (1-100) and an enhanced benefit (101-200).

weapons.benefit_1_100: Improves weapon reload and handling speeds. Improves damage versus minor and major combatants (0-15% for Primary/Special, 0-10% for Heavy).
weapons.benefit_101_200: Grants a chance for ammo bricks to contain more ammo. Improves damage versus boss combatants and Guardians (0-15% for Primary/Special, 0-10% for Heavy). Bonus weapon damage vs. players (0-6%).

health.benefit_1_100: Grants 0-70 healing when picking up an Orb of Power. Grants 0-10% flinch resistance.
health.benefit_101_200: Shields start recharging 0-25% more quickly and take 0-50% less time to fully recharge. Grants 0-20 additional shield capacity vs combatants.

class.benefit_1_100: Improves base cooldown of your class ability and energy gained from external sources.
class.benefit_101_200: Grants a 0-40 HP Overshield (0-10 in PvP) on casting your class ability.

melee.benefit_1_100: Improves the base cooldown of your melee ability and energy gained from external sources.
melee.benefit_101_200: Grants 0-30% increased melee ability damage (powered, unpowered, and Glaive).

grenade.benefit_1_100: Improves the base cooldown of your grenade ability and energy gained from external sources.

super.benefit_1_100: Improves Super energy gained from damaging targets and from external sources.

changes.description: All Armor 2.0 pieces are converted 1:1 to the new system (e.g., Mobility becomes Weapons).

New armor sets ('Armor 3.0') have set bonus perks for equipping two and four pieces. They drop with full Mod Energy. Masterworking new armor provides +1 to its three lowest stats per level (up to +5 total).
All melee-damage-increasing effects now stack additively. The Melee stat provides a multiplicative bonus on top of this. Melee damage no longer scales Scorch/Ignition damage.
Glaive melee is now an unpowered melee ability. PvE base damage reduced by 40% vs minors/majors, 28.5% vs Champions/minibosses, and 50% vs bosses/vehicles to compensate for access to new buffs.
Numerous abilities, Exotics, and perks have had their melee damage values increased to align with the new additive system.
examples: Titan - Roaring Flames: Max PvE melee damage bonus increased to 200% (from 73%).
Titan - Knockout: PvE uncharged melee bonus to 160% (from 100%), charged to 160% (from 50%).
Titan - Banner of War: Melee damage bonus for user/allies increased to 100% (from 40%).
Hunter - Combination Blow: Max PvE damage bonus increased to 400% (from 309%).
Hunter - Liar's Handshake: PvE melee damage increased to 400% (from 200%).
Warlock - Winter's Guile: Max PvE melee damage bonus increased to 400% (from 275%).
Weapon Perk - One-Two Punch: PvE melee damage bonus increased to 150% (from 100%).

changes.description: Ammo is now earned by filling a meter with kills and assists. The weapon Inventory stat is replaced with Ammo Generation. Ammo Finder mods improve meter contributions. Chest Reserves mods are replaced with Ammo Generation mods.
Difficulty scaling is now more linear. +100 over feels like old even Power. Even Power is slightly harder. -40 under is equivalent to old Grandmaster. -100 under is immune.
Red bar enemies do not increase in health nearly as quickly as elites and bosses as Power decreases.
Artifact Bonus Power is replaced by 'Seasonal Bonus Power' on New Gear. Power Floor is 10, Power Cap is 200. Seasonal Bonus Power goes to 450, increasing to 550 mid-season.
Infusion uses Enhancement Cores directly. Infusing Seasonal Bonus Power uses Unstable Cores.
Maximum cancellation damage increased by 50%. Minimum cancellation damage increased by 150%. Meter fills 25% faster.
Increased top-end damage bonus to +200% (from +150%). Damage bonus is granted earlier in the overdraw.
Increases Solar weapon damage and solar Ignition damage based on Roaring Flame stacks. Reduces time you are suspended, slowed, and frozen.
Kills with Auto Rifles or Machine Guns increase their stability, ammo generation and damage, stacking up to 10x.
Now also activates on Radiant damage. Grenade energy gain on damage increased to 5% (from 2.5%), gain on kill reduced to 15% (from 20%).
Combatants are less accurate towards you while the perk is active. Solar weapon final blows now grant restoration and reload your stowed weapons.
Super energy granted by ionic traces reduced to 4% (from 7%).
Sprinting to top off Bolt Charge now activates at 5 stacks (down from 6) and charges significantly faster.
Now requires only 3 hits to deploy a Guidance Ring. The ring lasts 20s (up from 13s). ALL bows fired through an allied player's Guidance Ring now spawn seeker missiles.
Grants a 25% PvE / 5% PvP damage bonus and increased Ammo Generation while the user has Woven Mail.
Reduced enhanced melee damage with ammo to +20% vs bosses (down from +50%) to account for it now being able to receive other melee damage bonuses.
Increased lunge distance of heavy attack by 3m. Defeating a target with Tesseract allows you to Tesseract again for a short duration.
Beam is now a special reload enabled by Firesprites from kills. Beam now scorches on hit and ignites on kills. Magazine increased to 20.
Now works with all melee abilities. PvE damage bonus increased to 150% (from 100%). Perk active time increased to 3 seconds (from 1.22s).
Shots to activate reduced. High-Impact Autos: 9 (from 12). Aggressive/High-Impact Scouts: 5 (from 6). Aggressive Hand Cannons: 4 (from 6). Adaptive Hand Cannons: 5 (from 6).
Increased ammo transferred per activation to 25% (from 10%).
Increased damage vs. bosses, minibosses, and Champions by 15% for the following grenades: Flux, Arcbolt, Flashbang, Storm, Axion Bolt, Suppressor, Firebolt, and Tripmine.
Devour heal amount reduced to 140hp (from 200hp).
Stasis Shatter damage now stuns Overload Champions instead of Unstoppable Champions.
Gambler’s Dodge melee energy return no longer requires dodging near an enemy.
Prismatic Aspects Ascension and Winter's Shroud reduced to 2 fragment slots (from 3).
Throwing Hammer pickup now provides an instant energy return.
Drengr’s Lash Suspend wave travel distance increased to 30m (from 20m).
Prismatic Aspect Consecration reduced to 2 fragment slots (from 3). Base Solar Consecration increased to 3 (from 2).
Pocket Singularity damage increased by 20% vs. non-boss combatants and 56% vs. boss combatants.
Prismatic Aspects Hellion and Bleak Watcher reduced to 2 fragment slots (from 3).
